alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:58AM MDT until June 15 at 12:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1230 PM MDT. * At 1157 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near John Martin Reservoir, or 25 miles west of Lamar, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... John Martin Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
